casebody.data:
FARMERS’ LOAN & TRUST CO., Respondent, v. HOFFMAN HOUSE, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by the Farmers’ Loan & Trust Company against the Hoffman House.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and FOLLETT, JJ.

B. F. Tracy, for appellant. D. McClure, for respondent.

No opinion. Reargument ordered. See 27 N. Y. Supp. 634.
